metadata.title: CVE-2020-13933 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Shiro before 1.6.0, when using Apache Shiro, a specially craftedHTTP request may cause an authentication bypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-5').
